featuredProjects.name: Newsly
featuredProjects.description: Newsly is a newsreader app. Being bombarded by articles and headlines and the highs and lows of normal news channels are commonplace in the world today. So with Newsly, I wanted to give users a way to track what they were consuming. For discipline, or for self-care, this mindful app for mindful news consumption was created to put more control in the hands of readers.

featuredProjects.name: jGames
featuredProjects.description: jGames is an app that allows a user to create a personalized profile and then sort their favorite video games into lists! A user can create as many lists as they want and mix and match games as much as they want. The only limit is what games they can think of!

featuredProjects.name: UFO Concept
featuredProjects.description: Playing around with WebGL and Three.js, I created an interactive concept of a friend's portfolio website. Using established themes and colors, I wanted to see if I could create more value, and ended up having a lot of fun!
